nodes.text: Around 0 ABY, a bounty hunter was working for the Galactic Empire on Kwenn Space Station. He was hired by the Empire to track down Commander Adar Tallon, believed to be in hiding on Tatooine. Alongside another hunter, the hunter was present when an Alliance to Restore the Republic team found Dana, an Alliance agent, dead at the feet of Imperial lieutenant Voor. The humanoid was killed during the ensuing skirmish.
The hunter was tall and scaly, and armed with a blaster pistol, blaster rifle, grenade and medpac.
